title: Augusta County: Tony Pastor to Annie Harris, October 13, 1862
summary: An update about camp life from Pastor to his lady friend Annie. He mentions that several men he knows recently died. Note that he mentions evacuating their last camp because there were too many "Confederates," in quotes. This might mean people trying to sell goods, camp followers, spies, or several other groups.
keywords: Camp Life, Church/Religious Activity, Death/Casualties, Prisons/Prisoners, American Civil War
